hero.subheading: Leverage advanced ML models to forecast Electric Vehicle sales, analyze market trends, and make data-driven decisions for Smart Cities.

feature.city_compare_desc: Compare EV adoption across multiple Smart Cities in Thailand.
feature.realtime_desc: Get instant insights with a responsive dashboard and interactive filters.
